name: Sprouting Thrinax
text: When Sprouting Thrinax dies, put three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor: The vast network of predation on Jund has actually caused some strange creatures to adapt to being eaten.

name: Woolly Thoctar
flavor: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.

name: Path to Exile
text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

name: Hellspark Elemental
text: Trample, haste\nAt the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental.\nUnearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Marisi's Twinclaws
text: Double strike
flavor: "Looks like we're completely outnumbered."\n"Lucky for us. I thought we'd be bored."

name: Slave of Bolas
text: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

name: Mycoid Shepherd
text: Whenever Mycoid Shepherd or another creature you control with power 5 or greater dies, you may gain 5 life.

name: Naya Sojourners
text: When you cycle Naya Sojourners or it dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\nCycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The elves had entered a land like an open grave-an act of fortitude or folly?

name: Mind Control
text: Enchant creature\nYou control enchanted creature.
flavor: "Why fight the body when you can dominate the mind that rules it?"\n—Jace Beleren

name: Rise from the Grave
text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
flavor: "Death is no excuse for disobedience."\n—Liliana Vess

name: Kor Duelist
text: As long as Kor Duelist is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor: "Swords cannot reach far enough. Chains cannot strike hard enough. An eternal dilemma, but a simple one."

name: Vampire Nighthawk
text: Flying\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)\nLifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

name: Nissa's Chosen
text: If Nissa's Chosen would die, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.

name: Emeria Angel
text: Flying\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

name: Kor Firewalker
text: Protection from red\nWhenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
flavor: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."

name: Leatherback Baloth
flavor: Heavy enough to withstand the Roil, leatherback skeletons are havens for travelers in storms and landshifts.

name: Hada Freeblade
text: Whenever Hada Freeblade or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Hada Freeblade.

name: Kalastria Highborn
text: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

name: Syphon Mind
text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
flavor: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

name: Pathrazer of Ulamog
text: Annihilator 3 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices three permanents.)\nPathrazer of Ulamog can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
flavor: No thought but hunger. No strategy but destruction.

name: Curse of Wizardry
text: As Curse of Wizardry enters the battlefield, choose a color.\nWhenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, that player loses 1 life.
flavor: "We must all push through the pain to heal our world."\n—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

name: Staggershock
text: Staggershock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.\nRebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Deathless Angel
text: Flying\n{W}{W}: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

name: Fling
text: As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature.\nFling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
flavor: Sometimes the cannoneer must become the cannonball.

name: Sylvan Ranger
text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

name: Plague Stinger
text: Flying\nInfect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor: It leaves its victims one sting closer to phyresis.

name: Golem's Heart
text: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may gain 1 life.
flavor: The heart of a golem gives life to more than just the iron husk around it.

name: Skinrender
text: When Skinrender enters the battlefield, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.
flavor: "Your creations are effective, Sheoldred, but we must unite the flesh, not merely flay it."\n—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Master's Call
text: Put two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor: The need to obey was inscribed on every plate in their bodies.

name: Plague Myr
text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)\n{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
flavor: They watch for a new master, one more sinister than the last.

name: Signal Pest
text: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)\nSignal Pest can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
flavor: It leaps from tree to tree, revealing the enemy's positions.

name: Fling
text: As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature.\nFling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
flavor: Sometimes the cannoneer must become the cannonball.

name: Sylvan Ranger
text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

name: Vault Skirge
text: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)\nFlying\nLifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: From the remnants of the dead, Geth forged a swarm to safeguard his throne.

name: Maul Splicer
text: When Maul Splicer enters the battlefield, put two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield.\nGolem creatures you control have trample.

name: Shrine of Burning Rage
text: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Burning Rage.\n{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Burning Rage: Shrine of Burning Rage deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.

name: Tormented Soul
text: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.
flavor: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

name: Auramancer
text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

name: Circle of Flame
text: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you or a planeswalker you control, Circle of Flame deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor: "Which do you think is a better deterrent: a moat of water or one of fire?"\n—Chandra Nalaar

name: Gather the Townsfolk
text: Put two 1/1 white Human creature tokens onto the battlefield.\nFateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, put five of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.
flavor: In the memories of those they lost lies the strength needed to defend their city.

name: Curse of the Bloody Tome
text: Enchant player\nAt the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor: After seeing his life's work drip away, the mage decided it was a good time to go crazy.

name: Curse of Thirst
text: Enchant player\nAt the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, Curse of Thirst deals damage to that player equal to the number of Curses attached to him or her.
flavor: "May you drink until you drown but never be sated."\n—Odila, witch of Morkrut

name: Nearheath Stalker
text: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor: "Do not speak of this to the elders. They look unfavorably upon my indulgences."

name: Bloodcrazed Neonate
text: Bloodcrazed Neonate attacks each turn if able.\nWhenever Bloodcrazed Neonate deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: While elder vampires select their meals with care, the newly sired frenzy at the first whiff.

name: Boneyard Wurm
text: Boneyard Wurm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor: The only thing it likes more than discovering a pit of bones is adding to it.
